hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: A virgin came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and mentioned that her father had married her against her will, so the Prophet (ﷺ) allowed her to exercise her choice

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْبِكْرِ يُزَوِّجُهَا أَبُوهَا وَلاَ يَسْتَأْمِرُهَا
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Virgin Who Was Married Off By Her Father Without He Consent
